content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to search for the best resources for language learning and travel destinations on Google. My search returned a list of potential destinations and languages to learn, which I passed on to you as a command to write to a file named "language_and_travel_ideas.txt". The list of potential destinations includes Peru, Spain, and Mexico, and the languages to learn include Spanish and American Sign Language. The command to write to file was successful. You attempted to clone a repository from the URL "https://github.com/kubeflow/examples" to the path "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/kubeflow_examples", but it returned an error due to an early EOF. You also sent a command to search for the best language learning repositories on GitHub and a command to clone a repository from the URL "https://github.com/linguist-ai/linguist" to the path "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/linguist".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command clone_repository returned: Error: Cmd('git') failed due to: exit code(128)\n  cmdline: git clone -v -- https://*****:*****@github.com/linguist-ai/linguist /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/linguist\n  stderr: 'Cloning into '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/linguist'...\nremote: Repository not found.\nfatal: repository 'https://github.com/linguist-ai/linguist/' not found\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best language learning repositories on GitHub"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://github.com/topics/language-learning", "https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/quickstart/hello-world", "https://github.com/practical-tutorials/project-based-learning", "https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/overview-of-github-copilot/about-github-copilot-for-individuals", "https://github.com/topics/language-learning?l=swift", "https://docs.github.com/en/actions", "https://towardsdatascience.com/top-11-github-repositories-to-learn-python-e75e8676757a", "https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/licensing-a-repository"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "clone_repository", "args": {"url": "https://github.com/duolingo/halflife-regression", "clone_path": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/halflife-regression"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command clone_repository returned: Cloned https://github.com/duolingo/halflife-regression to /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/halflife-regression'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/halflife-regression"}}}'}]
"""
